source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenic video shows a paved road running through vast, green rice paddies. The sky is a brilliant blue, filled with large, fluffy white clouds, and rolling hills are visible in the distance. The camera moves forward along the road, offering a peaceful view of the rural landscape.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenic video shows a paved road running through vast, green rice paddies. The sky is a brilliant blue, filled with large, fluffy white clouds, and rolling hills are visible in the distance. The camera moves forward along the road, offering a peaceful view of the rural landscape.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a cyclist rides along the road, which is not visible in the video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This scenic video shows a paved road running through vast, green rice paddies, with a cyclist riding along it. The sky is a brilliant blue, filled with large, fluffy white clouds, and rolling hills are visible in the distance. The camera moves forward along the road, offering a peaceful view of the rural landscape.
